programme.title: College GameDay
programme.desc: The GameDay crew goes on the road to various locations at different campuses across the country and discusses the biggest games of the week, while evaluating player performances; experts weigh in on trending topics and teams throughout the nation.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Gonzaga (16-6, 7-2) won its last two games after a 98-60 win over Oregon State behind Graham Ike, who is fourth in the WCC with 17.3 ppg; Saint Mary's (19-3, 9-0) won nine-straight games, and won two of three meetings last season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Arkansas (12-8, 1-6) comes off a 65-62 loss to Oklahoma, and is 3-5 away from home; No. 12 Kentucky (15-5, 4-3) is third in the country in scoring, averaging 87.6 ppg behind Otega Oweh, who leads the Wildcats with 15.8 ppg, and is 11-1 at home.

programme.title: 2025 NFL Pro Bowl Games
programme.desc: Head coach Eli Manning and the NFC look to make it three-straight wins over coach Peyton Manning and the AFC, as the two all-star squads compete in various skills competitions, capped off with a flag football game between the teams.

programme.title: 2025 NFL Pro Bowl Games
programme.desc: Head coach Eli Manning and the NFC look to make it three-straight wins over coach Peyton Manning and the AFC, as the two all-star squads compete in various skills competitions, capped off with a flag football game between the teams.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Los Angeles and New York split victories in their two meetings from the 2023-24 season with the Lakers claiming a 113-105 win in the final matchup on Feb. 3; LA's LeBron James and Austin Reaves combined for 46 points in the victory away from home.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Boston bested Philadelphia in three of their four meetings in the 2023-2024 season, including the final matchup on Feb. 27, 117-99, led by Jaylen Brown's 31 points and 6 rebounds; Tyrese Maxey had 32 points and 5 assists for the 76ers in the loss.

programme.title: Postseason NFL Countdown
programme.desc: Upcoming NFL postseason matchups are previewed and evaluated by expert analysts, featuring highlights from previous games, profiles of playmakers on each team, a breakdown of what to expect, and updates on the latest news from around the league.

programme.title: NFL Pro Bowl Kickoff
programme.desc: Analysts discuss the upcoming matchup between the stars of both the AFC and NFC, including interviews with members of coaching staffs, as well as look back at some of the accomplishments and stats of players on each team throughout the 2018 season.

programme.desc: The worldwide leader in sports covers all the important stories of the day, including game highlights, player interviews, and special segments; correspondents relay up-to-the-minute news and game-day reports from major sporting events.

programme.title: Get Up

programme.title: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee and his friends deliver one-of-a-kind opinions on the latest news making headlines in sports and entertainment, along with special segments and guest interviews with some of the biggest names to give a unique experience.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon, longtime colleagues and friends, engage in verbal sparring during a fast-paced and wide-ranging discussion about current events in the world of sports; Kornheiser and Wilbon also interview special guests.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Memphis claimed victories over Milwaukee in both of their meetings from the 2023-24 season, winning the final matchup on Apr. 3 with a 111-101 scoreline; Jarn Jackson Jr. posted 35 points and 4 assists for the Grizzlies in the win away from home.

programme.title: ESPN First Take
programme.desc: Molly Qerim is the moderator while veteran commentators Stephen A. Smith and Max Kellerman discuss and deliberate the latest topics in the world of sports; the debate show also features guest appearances by entertainers, athletes and journalists.

programme.desc: A panel of reporters from across the country debate trending topics and stories in sports with points being awarded for valid arguments, and at the end of the show, the winner is awarded 30 uninterrupted seconds to discuss any topic of their choice.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Bradley (18-4, 9-2) had its five-game winning streak ended by Illinois-Chicago, 93-70, but won four of the last five meetings; Northern Iowa (13-9, 7-4) is 10-2 at home behind Tytan Anderson, who leads the Panthers in scoring with 14.7 ppg.

programme.desc: An in-depth examination of a particular athlete or issue that has captured the attention of sports fanatics across the nation; coverage includes exclusive interviews, exhaustive reporting and extensive expert analysis regarding the subject.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Notre Dame (10-10, 4-5) won its last two games after a 71-68 win over Georgia Tech behind 26 points from Markus Burton; Miami (4-17, 0-10) lost 10 straight since beating Presbyterian, 94-75, on Dec. 15, but won the last three meetings.

programme.title: College Basketball Live
programme.desc: Game commentators provide a detailed look at all things pertaining to college basketball, including previews of upcoming games, analysis of game-changing moments, discussions on breaking news, highlights of top players and more.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: USF (11-10, 4-4) comes off a 69-64 win over Rice after dropping four of the previous five, and won its meeting with the Owls last season, 90-86; Florida Atlantic (11-10, 4-4) is 5-3 at home behind Kaleb Glenn, who leads the Owls with 12.6 ppg.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: Notre Dame claimed wins over Louisville in two of their three meetings from the 2023-24 season, including in the ACC Tournament quarterfinals on March 8, 77-68; Sonia Citron posted 26 points and 3 assists for the Fighting Irish in the victory.

programme.title: ESPN Original Documentaries
programme.desc: The life and career of Eugene F. "Buddy" Teevens III is celebrated, showcasing the groundbreaking innovations he brought to college football during his coaching tenure which spanned four decades and the impact he made off the field.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Coverage of college basketball games.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: Duke and North Carolina State split wins in their two meetings from the 2023-24 season with the Wolfpack claiming a 54-51 victory in the ACC Tournament quarterfinals on March 8; Aziaha James posted 16 points and 8 rebounds for NC State in the win.

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: An update on all the top stories in college football, featuring interviews with players and coaches, analysis of the strongest teams in the country, evaluations of each major conference, and discussions on which schools are championship contenders.

programme.title: NASCAR Cup Series Qualifying
programme.desc: Cup Series drivers qualify for the Cook Out Clash at Bowman Gray Stadium, vying for the fastest times to claim the best possible start positions; Bowman Gray Stadium in North Carolina is back to hosting NASCAR for the first time since 1971.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: TCU and Iowa State last met on Feb. 25, 2023, where the Cyclones claimed an 84-56 victory over the Horned Frogs behind Ashley Joens' 22 points and 11 rebounds; Tomi Taiwo posted 13 points and 2 rebounds for TCU in the road defeat.

programme.title: NASCAR Cup Series Qualifying
programme.desc: Cup Series drivers qualify for the Cook Out Clash at Bowman Gray Stadium, vying for the fastest times to claim the best possible start positions; Bowman Gray Stadium in North Carolina is back to hosting NASCAR for the first time since 1971.

programme.title: Empty Cup: Quest for the 1992 NASCAR Championship
programme.desc: Davey Allison had a tumultuous journey to compete for the 1992 Winston Cup Championship, nearly derailing his chances at the Winston All-Star race before holding a points lead going into the final race of the circuit, the Hooters 500.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: New Mexico (17-4, 9-1) won three-straight games behind Donovan Dent, who leads the Mountain West in scoring with 19.6 ppg; Utah State (19-2, 9-1) is 11-1 at home behind Ian Martinez, and won eight of the last nine meetings with the Lobos.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: TCU and Iowa State last met on Feb. 25, 2023, where the Cyclones claimed an 84-56 victory over the Horned Frogs behind Ashley Joens' 22 points and 11 rebounds; Tomi Taiwo posted 13 points and 2 rebounds for TCU in the road defeat.

programme.title: Women's College Gymnastics
programme.desc: Michigan State and UCLA last met on March 11, 2001, where the Bruins claimed a 195.475-194.000 victory behind a perfect 10.0 on uneven bars from Mohini Bhardwaj; Jane McIntosh posted a 9.925 on the balance beam for the Spartans in the loss.

programme.title: Women's College Gymnastics
programme.desc: Michigan State and UCLA last met on March 11, 2001, where the Bruins claimed a 195.475-194.000 victory behind a perfect 10.0 on uneven bars from Mohini Bhardwaj; Jane McIntosh posted a 9.925 on the balance beam for the Spartans in the loss.

programme.title: NHRA Sportsman Series
programme.desc: The top drag racing teams in the country compete in different classifications; drivers accumulate points based on the results of each event and at the end of the season a champion is crowned in the various drag-racing classes.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Seton Hall (6-15, 1-9) lost six-straight games, but won six of the last seven meetings after an 85-80 OT win on Jan. 8 behind Dylan Addae-Wusu and Isaiah Coleman; DePaul (10-12, 1-10) dropped three straight, but has nine wins at home, going 9-5.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: Indiana claimed a 91-69 victory over Nebraska in their lone meeting of the 2023-24 season on Jan. 7, 2024, led by 22 points and 6 rebounds from Mackenzie Holmes; Alexis Markowski posted 21 points and 6 rebounds for the Cornhuskers in the defeat.

programme.desc: Insiders and journalists provide a detailed look inside all the action around the Big East, including highlights from the biggest games, discussions on relevant sports topics, previews of upcoming matchups, player profiles, and much more.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: No. 25 UConn (15-6, 7-3) split its last six games after a 72-61 win over DePaul, and won eight of the last 10 meetings; No. 9 Marquette (18-3, 9-1) is 11-1 at home this season behind Kam Jones, who is second in the Big East in scoring with 18.9 ppg.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: TCU and Iowa State last met on Feb. 25, 2023, where the Cyclones claimed an 84-56 victory over the Horned Frogs behind Ashley Joens' 22 points and 11 rebounds; Tomi Taiwo posted 13 points and 2 rebounds for TCU in the road defeat.

programme.desc: The NASCAR Cup Series heads to Bowman Gray Stadium in Winston-Salem, North Carolina for the first of two exhibition races in the 2025 season; Bowman Gray Stadium is back to hosting the NASCAR Cup Series for the first time since 1971.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: USC and Iowa last met on Nov. 28, 2013, where the Hawkeyes claimed a 78-65 victory behind 22 points and 7 assists from Samantha Logic; Brianna Barrett posted 15 points for USC in the defeat at the Hard Rock Resort in Riviera Maya, Mexico.

programme.title: Breakfast Ball
programme.desc: Craig Carton, a newly inducted member of the New York State Broadcasters Hall of Fame, joins Chicago sports radio personality Danny Parkins and FOX NFL game analyst Mark Schlereth to discuss the most enticing stories in sports each weekday morning.

programme.desc: Breaking down the biggest sports news of the day along with various unique segments that help the host present his opinions on sports; players, coaches and celebrities are interviewed and discuss trending topics happening around the world.

programme.desc: The daily sports talk show delivers a compelling, informative and passionate filter to the top sports stories of the day as the host engages in lively discussions, debates and disagreements over the day's news, and no topic is off limits.

programme.desc: Vegas (3-2), which had its two-game winning streak snapped with a 3-1 loss on the road to Atlanta on Jan. 23, defeated the Valkyries, 3-2, on Jan. 19; Orlando (2-2) is unbeaten at home in 2025.
